Fast Food Nation: The Dark Side of the All-American Meal bụ akwụkwọ edere n’afo Puku abuo na otu (2001) nke onye odee akwukwo bù  Eric Schlosser dere. Nke mbụ Rolling Stone dere na 1999, akwụkwọ ahụ emeela ka e jiri ya tụnyere akwụkwọ akụkọ Upton Sinclair nke afo Otu Puku na isii (1906) The Jungle A gbanwere akwụkwọ ahụ ka ọ bụrụ ihe nkiri emerge n’afo Puku abuo na isii (2006) nke otu aha ahụ, nke Richard Linklater duziri.
